text: A 20 percent chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 61. South wind around 6 mph.

Rain likely before 11pm, then showers likely after 11pm. Cloudy, with a low around 48. South southwest wind 6 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New precipitation amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

Showers likely, then showers and possibly a thunderstorm after 11am. High near 60. South wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm, then showers after 8pm. Low around 53. South wind 11 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New precipitation amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

Showers, with thunderstorms also possible after 11am. High near 61. West southwest wind 10 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
A 40 percent chance of showers, mainly before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49.
